name: Scope Creep Hack-venture - Learn Linux and Hacking
blurb: Learn Linux or Ethical Hacking from the ground up while playing a 3D fully immersive and interactive adventure game. NEW VIDEO!!

rewards.reward: Thank you for your support! All backers will be listed in a special credits page in the game. You also have our heartfelt gratitude.
You will receive early access to final version of the game. This means that you will be notified and granted access to the game at least 15 days before final public release.

Linux Lover - Backers at this level will get a modded version of the game that has a focus on teaching Linux skills from the ground up. This is a Kickstarter exclusive and will not be available to others once the full game is released.\r\nYou also receive the previous reward tiers and guaranteed Beta Access. We will have a forum setup to take your input on the game and how it is coming along.

The previous reward tiers plus a complete game walk-through in PDF format with detailed technical explanations of the penetration testing techniques necessary to complete the game scenarios. If you are learning, this tier is for you.

The previous reward tiers plus you get to have your name (or pseudonym) in the game. You may choose placement on a selection of items such as an office\\cubical name plate or in one of several in-game items such as newspapers. Please note that we will not put anything inappropriate into the game.

The previous reward tiers plus a video walk-through of the game with full explanations of all penetration testing techniques necessary to finish the game. The videos will go hand in hand with the PDF walk-through.
The previous reward tiers plus your name prominently displayed in the credits as a major contributor. Thank you.

The previous reward tiers plus free access to any future modules and training materials developed for the Merl McPenrite series. (This is the only module we are thinking about releasing for free and the training material\\ walk through itself will never be free). You will also be listed as a lifetime supporter in our splash-screen displayed at the beginning of the game. You will also receive a  copy of the book "Advanced Penetration Testing for Highly-Secured Environments: The Ultimate Security Guide" signed by the author of the book. Will will also place a small token of appreciation for your support in the game via a trophy, statue, or other tribute to acknowledge your contribution.

Corporate supporter level - The previous reward tiers plus you may have your company logo displayed as a supporter in it's own splash screen prior to the start of the game. Nothing inappropriate please. Your logo will need to be approved by our team prior to being placed in the splash screen. If you have product placement that you would like to see within the game such as a small poster, desktop background, branded TV, etc. we will make that happen as well. Once again, it will have to be appropriate for our target audience. You will have to give us written permission to use your logo and\\or branding in the game if you chose this tier.
